KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Matrix compareNE 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareLE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareNE function to compare two Matrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Matrix are compared to determine whether one Matrix is equal to the other.

Syntax.Note:
The value of the first Matrix is not equal to the value
of the second Matrix.

The value of the first Matrix is not equal to the value
of the second Matrix.
